concat.scalar: There are 5 departments in our college
I didn't catch that. Select a valid option:

Electronics and Communication Engineering (ECE) is a large branch of engineering that focuses on electronic devices and equipment. ECE professionals design, develop, and research electronic devices, and may also troubleshoot them. ECE also covers the study of circuits, communication systems, and how data is received. Students in ECE may learn how satellites, radio, television,
and audio transmission work.

Computer Science Engineering (CSE) is a four-year undergraduate engineering degree that covers a range of topics related to computation. These topics include: programming languages, algorithm analysis, software, computer hardware, and program design.
Mechanical engineering is a branch of engineering that focuses on systems in motion, including machines, energy conversion systems, materials, and equipment.

Electrical and Electronics Engineering (EEE) is a branch of engineering that combines electrical and electronics engineering. It is a popular course that provides knowledge about electrical and machine technology, circuit analysis, telecommunication systems, power engineering, and related industries.

The Information Technology (IT) branch can be a good choice for engineering because it offers many career options in a variety of fields, including finance, arts, medicine, and defense. IT specialists are also in demand at many IT firms across India.
